Name: Entwistle's Error
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.
Review: Long and refreshing with rum character, lemon freshness and tonic water's slightly bitter bite.
Nutrition: One serving of Entwistle's Error contains 234 calories
